text: Sodhra Kopra railway station (, ) is located in Sodhra town, Gujranwala district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Gujranwala District Category:Railway stations on Wazirabad–Narowal Branch Line
title: Sodhra Kopra railway station
